description:
Hoist {Get,Set}InputInProgress() to ToolbarModel from subclasses, and make them
cheap inline accessors.

Every subclass implements these the same simple way (member bool and simple
accessors), so there's no reason they need to be virtual.

BUG=none
TEST=none
R=msw@chromium.org

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=218766

messages.text:
